headline: Coterra Energy to Participate at Upcoming Barclays Conference
summary: HOUSTON, August 28, 2025--Coterra Energy Inc. (NYSE: CTRA) ("Coterra" or the "Company") today announced that Thomas E. Jorden, Chairman, Chief Executive Officer and President, will participate in a fireside chat at the Barclays CEO Energy-Power Conference. The fireside chat will begin at 9:45 AM ET on Thursday, September 4, 2025.
